member.name: T:Senkel.Model.Decorating.Decorable
member.summary: Represents an object that can be decorated by another object.

member.summary: The decorator that is used by the decorable instance.

member.name: M:Senkel.Model.Decorating.Decorable.#ctor(Senkel.Model.Decorating.IDecorator)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that is decorated by the specified object.
member.param: The decorator that this instance is decorated by.

member.name: M:Senkel.Model.Decorating.Decorable.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that is not decorated by any object by using the value instead.

member.summary: Decorates the object using the initially set object.
